items.question: How can your Will & Trust preparation services help protect my wealth?
items.answer: With future-proof wills and trusts, our experts streamline wealth transfers, protect heirs from disputes, and minimise tax liabilities.

items.question: Can One Nexuz help me set up a family foundation?
items.answer: Yes, our seasoned wealth management consultants assist in establishing and structuring private foundations that align with your family’s values while maximising after-tax returns.

items.question: What are the benefits of a UAE Golden Visa for high-net-worth individuals?
items.answer: The UAE Golden Visa grants 10-year renewable residency, allowing you to live, work, and invest in a zero-income-tax jurisdiction, secure your family’s future, and access world-class infrastructure and education.

items.question: How can Second Citizenship Programs benefit me?
items.answer: A second passport can offer tax optimisation opportunities, global mobility, asset diversification, and a safety net for your family, allowing you to multiply your wealth.

items.question: Can these millionaire and billionaire services be fully customised for my family’s needs?
items.answer: Absolutely! Every solution, from wealth management and family foundation structuring to residency planning, is tailored to your unique objectives, risk appetite, and long-term legacy vision.
